def_en: Elastoplast is a type of sticky tape that you use to cover small cuts on your body.

def_cn: （解决办法）创可贴式的，暂时的
def_en: If you refer to an Elastoplast solution to a problem, you mean that you disapprove of it because you think that it will only be effective for a short period.
